name: Witching Hour (LooksFineToMe)
description:
This is a student group project.

Team name: Witching Hour Studios

Witching Hour is a top down, scavenger hunt stealth game, with the player competing against the clock to try and craft the perfect potion before the sun rises. Players craft this potion with ingredients they find in the level, and must figure out the correct order in which to put the ingredients. Racing against the clock and trying to hide from bulking peasants, Witching Hour is easy to pick up, but very hard to put down.
